organisation_name: EUPLAT - European Association of Public e-Tendering Platform Providers (EUPLAT)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: EUPLAT is set up to discuss and represent common interests of commercial e-tendering platforms serving EU public contracting authorities and economic operators. It is an International Not-for-Profit Association organized under the Belgian law
